content.raw:
I've added a minimal example on my fork that calls `ign_configure_build`:

* https://bitbucket.org/scpeters/ign-cmake/commits/e59950f36b14b73536ed22fdd3440b7566fef551

I need to figure out how to make a target that will configure this example with a few different build types, so we can run `make examples`
